title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 901/98 of 28 April 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 901/98 of 28 April 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For frozen squid of the species Loligo spp., point (a) of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 shall be replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 April 1998.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 350, 31. 12. 1994, p. 15.
(3) OJ L 333, 21. 12. 1984, p. 41.
(4) OJ L 215, 26. 7. 1989, p. 9.
ANNEX
